motif.name: NES/CRM1
motif.summary: Leucine-rich nuclear export signal (NES) binding to the CRM1 exportin protein

definition.name: Recomended
definition.description: Regular expression updated and PSSM computed with ValidNES, DUBs and Ligases without assay scores

definition.name: Relaxed
definition.description: Use when more candidates needed. Regular expression relaxed and PSSM computed with ValidNES, DUBs and Ligases without assay scores

definition.name: Wregex A
definition.description: Regular expression derived from ELM and PSSM computed with NESsential training set

definition.name: Wregex B
definition.description: Regular expression derived from ELM and PSSM computed with ValidNES and DUBs

definition.name: Wregex C
definition.description: Regular expression updated and PSSM computed with DUBs and Ligases without assay scores

definition.name: Wregex D
definition.description: Regular expression updated and PSSM computed with DUBs and Ligases using assay scores
